meanings.definition: A person who actively promotes or supports a particular cause or movement.
meanings.sent1: The campaigners organized a fundraiser to help the local animal shelter.
meanings.sent2: The campaigners marched in the streets to raise awareness about climate change.
meanings.sent3: The campaigners tried to convince everyone to wear silly hats for their cause.
meanings.sent4: The campaigners were like busy bees buzzing around, spreading their message.
meanings.sent5: The image of the campaigners holding up signs will stay with me forever.

meanings.definition: A group of people who work together to achieve a specific goal.
meanings.sent1: The campaigners collaborated to clean up the park and plant new flowers.
meanings.sent2: The campaigners celebrated their successful completion of the community project.
meanings.sent3: The campaigners decided to all wear matching hats to show their unity.
meanings.sent4: The campaigners were a powerful force, like a team of superheroes.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the campaigners working in harmony was truly inspiring.
